div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die
Octobris anno quo supra

the said day Katherine chamer grantit hir Souerte for xvj
s' to henry orvm sergeand' for cristiane Schipherde quhilk suld'
be pait to Williame Dauisone in the barnys

the saide day george talyour' grantit him dettour' to Dauid
mathesone for vj peter of woll for Alexander Ketht quhilkis
the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus deductum per priorem et
conuentum predicatorum de terra vasta in via furcarum inter terram
magistri Alexandri cullane rectoris de Oyne ex australi et terram
Robertj cullane ex boreali vsque ad Curiam legalem proximam post
festum natiuitatis Saluatoris nostri absque preiudicio parcium

The saide day philp Dunbrek become Souerte be his hand
vphaldin In presence of the aldirman and balyeis to sere mathow nichol
sone procurator In that part to the chaplannis of the College of Abirdene
to pay tham xxtj s' at martymes next to Cum for the annuell
Rent runnyn bipassit and vnpait one the land' that was Walter
pyotis liand' in the gallogat one the Est part of the samyn gate
betuix the lande of vmquhile Richerd Kintor one the Southt part
one that ane part Ande the lande of Sanct' peteris altar one
the northt part one that vthir part pertening to the said chaplannis for
the ourgevin of thar richt to the said' land' Recouerit be process'
And' to pay tene s' yerlie to the said' chaplannis for the annuell
Rent aucht to thame of the said' land ay quhile It be
biggit and strenyeabile for the said annuell Rent tharof
fiwe s' at martymes next hereftir and v s' at Witsonday and say furtht
termlie quhile the said land' be Strenyeabile quhilk
land the freris priour frer' Dauid andirsone of the hous' of
the frer predicatouris of this burghe redemit fra the said chaplanis
recouerit be thame throu lauchful proces' obefor Ande promittit
to mak the said land strenyeabile within ane yer' hereftir
and to freithe the said philp of his oblising and pament
of the said xxtj s' and annuell Rent of s' termlie and yerlie
as said' is

head.add: Judicium processus capellanorum Collegij de Abirdene

div.p:
Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum matheum nicholsone et
dominum Alexandrum club capellanos Collectores ac procuratores capellanorum Collegij de
Abirdene de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste
Jacentis infra dictum burgum ex orien'rien' overwrites 'ccid'. tali parte vie regie qua Itur
ad le bolbrig inter terram quondam Johannis gothrasone ex australi
ex vna et croftum fratrum predicatorum ex boreali partibus ab altera in defectu
solucionis vnius annuj redditus quinque solidorum eisdem capellanis a longo
tempore debit' et non solut' vnde dictus dominus matheus nomine
procuratorio quo supra peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis
Juris et Justicie Complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata
decreuit quod dictus dominus matheus nomine procuratorio quo supra proprietatem
et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit In defectu solucionis dicti
annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris
Curie datum pro Judicio teste curia

Eodem die perlectis tribus per priorem fratrum predicatorum de Abirdene de et super
recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis in vico
superiori ecclesie inter terram thome prat ex orientali ex vna et terram
thome mar ex australi et communiones vias regias versus boriam
et occidens defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus sex s' et
octo d' dictis fratribus a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde
dictus prior frater Dauid andirsone nomine procuratorio quo supra peciit a
ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justicie
Complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata decret decrevit quod dictus
dominus prior nomine procuratorio quo supra proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre
legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus Et
hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie datum pro
Judicio Teste Curia et Alexandro Rede Johanne Colisone Andrea
branche Johanne menyeis Dauid mar' patricio leslie phi
lippo Dunbrek seriando et Johanne Williamsone Juniore Similiter quibus
dictus prior peciit Instrumentum a domino Johanne Stirueling notario

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
Octobris quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander rede
forspekar that Jonhne of Retre sal pay tua barrelis of Salmond
to Richard hill eldar eftir the tenor' of his writ the said Richerd
payand the maile of It to the tone And' atour It was deliuerit
that the saide Richerd sal content refund' and pay to the saide
Jonhe ale kyne gudis that he has takin or' ger' tak out
of the land tak sene his modir deces' safar' as the said Johne
cane preyve

Eodem die patricius leslie fecit constituit et ordinauit Robertum
Cullane et gilbertum menyes coniuctim et divisim suos procuratores legittimos ad prose
quendum plegium super Johannem blabir alias per ipsum porrectum penes
cedulam compotum mercanciarum suarum de opido edanen' et cetera et in
omnibus aliis causis et actionibus ipsum concernentibus promitten' de Rato
et Rato grato

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo die Octobris
quo supra

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
thomas prat forspekar that Jonhne of myll Adam myl and Alexander
of myll wranguislie and Inordinatlie lest the Justice myll'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame Kintor forspekar that Jonhne litstar is aving' x s'
to Androw branche to be pait within terme of law

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' sere Jonhne'
ruthirfurd' knicht forspekar that Copin gravin bursour and seruitour'
to Jonhe Damar' portar of brugis sal content and pay to Johne
matlande and thome matland' xvj s' Scottis money for the
wirkinge and mendinge of the keruele for iiij tydis quhilkis
the said copin pait in novmirit money

The said day Willekin said and Alexander angousone has gude sone
hed nocht pay Jonhne matland for iij dais werk one his schip
he suld' pay him

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day criste prat come Souerte be his hande and gudis
to thome narne in tuelf markis ix s' and ij d' vsuale mo
ney of Scotlande for Alexander prat his brothir to be pait be
Witsonday next hereftir for ane annuel rent of j mark
bocht fra the said thomas And the said Alexander oblist him
be his handis and gudis to freithe the said cristj of the pament
of the said Some

the saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Jonhne andirsone forspekar that Androw cristesone is avinge x s'
to Alexander prat to be pait within terme of law

The said Alexander Robertsone protestit to be fre and quyt of Robert
allannis challance vnto the tyme he be new follouit sene
he was redy be him self and mastir Jonhne badenaghe' his forspekar
to ansuer' to the said Robert and he wald' nocht follow him

The said day thareftir comperit Alexander Rede forspekar to Robert allanne and
offerit him redy to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be Alexander
Robertsone quhilkis was nocht present as thane to follow tharfor he
protestit to be quyt of his challance vnto the tyme he be followit
be new Soytis

The saide day Jonhne of mar' allegit the process' followit be patrik
leslie one Jonhne blabir' cassit and disert in it Self becaus'
the said Jonhne was nocht Callit this day to entir to ansuer'
to the borghe strekit one him be the said patrik

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die
Octobris

the said day philp Dunbrek officiar' grantit that he hed
takin Alexander prat Souerte to entir Alexander robertsone
befor the aldirman and balyeis within this tolbutht one monunday cum viij dais to an
suer' to the borghe strekit one him be Robert cussn'n' overwrites 'y'.y
for the wranguis' haldin of xlvj s' and viij d' or ellis
to pay the said Some one to the said' Robert'

Eodem die Robertus Cusny fecit constituit et ordinavit
Alexandrum rede suum legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem ac nuncium
Specialem ad prosequendum Alexandrum Robertsone et Alexandrum prat suum
plegium pro xvj s' et viij d' Ratum gratum firmum et stabile
promitten' et cetera cum aliis clausulis ad procuratorium necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die
Octobris anno quo supra

The said day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of consal ande
Communite present for the tyme grantit and Sett thar' Justice myllis
to Alexander Coupar ande Jonhne of myll with the Justice myl croft with the bank betuix the gat and the burne
equalie betuix thame to be Josit for the termes of xv'v' overwrites 'ij'. yeris
of maile yerlie entirand' In pament at the Witsonday next
to cum payand' four markis and demi mark and the tothir half mark
defaltit to the said Alexander Coupar for the bigin of the said mill'
of the said terme and fiwe merkis at martimes in winter thareftir
and say furtht termlie fiwe markis Induringe the said xv'v' overwrites 'ij'. yeris

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij
die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The said day Williame Wormet allegit that thomas mar'
had made certane contrakis and condicionis in fraud and dissat of
him to his preiudice and skathtis quhilkis the said thomas oppinlie
denyit that euire he hed maid ony contrakis in fraud or skath
of him or ony vthiris

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
octobris quo supra

The said day It was fundin ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Jhone'
culane forspekar that Jhon' blabir' sall haue the xxj barrelis of as' that he
brocht him out of Danskin in William gareauchis schip to patrik leslie
Ande the saide Jhon' sal deliuer the Estlande burdis to the saide patrik
quhilk he tuk for his waring' in Danskin eftir the passage
of the next schippis sayland' out of the port of Abirdene to Danskin
ffor the fulfilling of the quhilkis the bailyeis chargit Androw nachty
officiar to tak souerte

The saide day Jhone blabir was fundin dettur to William
gareauche schippar for the frauche of xxj barrelis of as' quhilkis
the bailyes chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The said day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day xv
dais monunday the ix day of nouember' to William Wormet
to preyve his excepcion proponit and allegit Ciuilie to agan
ane Instrument producit be thomas mar' vndir the Signe manuale
and Subscripcione of sere Robert leis notar public'The court continues on page 683.

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Alexandri
chamer de murchill anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quinto

Johannes Knollis Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Johannes low iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento et solut'
v s' in alba bursa

gilbertus Scrogis Jure paternatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Thomas talyour' Jure paternatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa

Johannes portar Jure paternitatis recipitur in librum liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa
Dauid' atkin Jure paternitatis

Johannes Stevinsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jure
paterno prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s'

Johannes auchneywe Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Juramento et Solut' quinque s' in alba bursa

Alexander pantone Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito JuratoJuramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Richardus flessar Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Willelmus Walcar Recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsavit filiam
burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Eodem dieThis is a continuation of the court on page 680. henricus rede deuenit plegium legalis quod thomas
mar et Dauid mar' filius suus erunt Indempnes pro Willelmo Wormet
aliter quam per viam iuris Et Richardus hile Junior deuenit plegius
legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam iuris
Et dictus thomas deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis
pro Dauid mar' filio suo aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum
parcium obligatur ad releuandum suos plegios de huiusmodi fideiussione

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit gerte cale lauch
fullie thome gledstane be Androw nachtj sergeand' to ansuer to the
borghe' strekit one him be Dauid Spens for the wrang
uislie haldin fra him of j barrel and demi of Salmond' xxviij
s' of Siluer and iij s' for Cardis to compt and rekning tharfor
thai ordanit the saide sergeand' to pas' and tak ane distreis' of
the saide thomas and latt it to borghe' agane and it be askit
and warne him to this day xv dais

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The said day comperit sere mathow nicholsone In presence of the
aldirman and ballieis and schew How he was Collector and procurator
to the chaplannis of the College of Abirdene this yer' bigan and In
thar' nayme he hed resavit thre hingaris of gold' with perle
fra the executouris of vmquhile sere Dauid Waus in wed of vij li'
pertening to Elizibeth' Setone quhilkis hingaris he had causit
be prisit lauchfullie to vij li' as he allegit tharfor he perofferit the
said Jonat' to the said' Elizibeth' present in the said court and askit
the saide vij li' aucht to the said chaplannis quhilkis money
he gat nocht herfor the said sere mathow protestit Solemplie In the
nayme of the said chaplannis to be dischargit and fre of the
clame of the said Elizibeth' in tyme to Cum And the said
Elizibeth' bad the said sere mathow lay tham in wede to ony sufficient person

The said day William blicht yongar in ane Amerciament of the court be
ane Suorne assis' Robert blinsel forspekar for the strubulance of Wil
yeame andirsone James Sone and to Amend as law wile
and forber' in tym to Cum

The said day William blitht yongar in ane Amerciament of the court be the
said assis for the Stoppin of William andirsone James sone
to slay ane mart in the commone fleshous' for the quhilkis
offence bath the said partiis was oblist be thar' handis to stand
at the ordinance of the said assis' quhilkis riplie auisit ordanit
the said William to pay xl d' to the aldirman for the offence
done to ane bruthir of the gild' and to pay j li' and demi of wax to
the halie blud licht And gif euire he committis ony offence to the
said William andirsone or ony vthir bruthir of the gild' in tym
to Cum and beis conuikit tharin he sal pay xl s' to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die octobris
quo supra

The saide day thir personis eftir follouing that is to say
the wif of Sandy Wilsone the wif of Androw Michelsone the wif
of thome meldrum the wif of William belte the wif of Sanct Androwis
the wif of Androw lammintone the wif of Dauid talyour' the wif of thome
chamer the wif of James Srachin the wif of gilbert muresone Jonet
patonsone the wif of thome Skinnar the wif of Will Abirdene besse lichtone
Canny Duncansone the wif of James Kennartj and the wif of
Wat of mernys Ilkane in ane Amerciament of the court for the brekin
of the assis' In the brevinge of viij d' aile and to amend'
as law wile and forber' in tym to Cum be ane Suorne
assis'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The said day William' blicht eldar was in ane Amerciament of the court
be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne of Ratre forspekar for the strubulance
of seruand' to Williame andirsone James sone
and to Amend as law will and forber' in tyme to cum for
the quhilkis gif euire he committis ony strubulance to the said woman
or ony vthir famous' persone In tyme to cum he sal pay
xxtj s' to Sanct nicholes werk in tyme to cum continent
but ony forgevenes the said partiis beinge oblist to stand to
this deliuerance

The said' day Androw monrow was in ane Amerciament of
the Courte for the wranguis' borghe' strekin one Alexander
gray anent the hayme bringin of ane dispensacion fra the
Court of Rome et cetera and he quyt of his challance quhile
he be follouit and persewit be now Soytis

Eodem die Robertus gone amerciatur pro Impedimento facto Willelmo blicht
penes Interfectionem vnius bestie in communi Carnificio Cuj
emendabit vt Jura volunt et cetera et de cetero Euitabit

the saide day thir personis wndir writin was conuikit for brekin of assis' in
breuyn and selling of viij d' aile that is to say marione leis the wyf
of george Dys' the wif of Duncan smitht the wif of John barbour the
wif of William leche the wif of Will blicht the wif of Robert
flessar Elspat mathesone the wif of criste prat the wif of John
flessar the wif of Robert evinsone the wif of Jonhne tulibow
Cristiane ancroft the wif of thomas Smyth

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo
die mensis nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day Williame Wormet producit thomas leslie and
Jonhne of Retre quhilkis Suorne in presence of David mar' sone
to thomas mar' deponit be thar' aithis anent the excepcionis
proponit be the said William agan ane Instrument vndir the signe
manuale of sere Robert leis notar quhilkis ar' closit to be oppinit
be the aldirman and consale day and tyme accordinge tharto

The said day Dauid mar' protestit Solemptlie In his fadir
nayme quhat thinge was done her this suld' nocht
do preiudice to his fadir
